description.narrative: 1- Employment Creation: The Project is estimated to create 120 direct jobs Emerging Markets. Furthermore, over 4,000 indirect and induced jobs along the value chain are expected to be created. 2- Value Chain Creation: Unimetco intends to source its raw materials locally / regionally based on availability. Increasing import substitution is expected to boost local production in appliances, adhesives and footwear sectors. 3- SME Creation: The expansion plan is expected to contribute to SMEs' growth under transportation, logistics and other services. 4- Climate Change Impact: The Project will mitigate climate impact through (i) use of PET scrap in its production, and (ii) production of insulation products promoting overall energy efficiency. 5- Fiscal Benefits: The Project will lead to positive fiscal impacts on host countries through taxes paid and support in foreign trade balance from decreased imports and increased exports.

Unimetco Holding (Unimetco or the Company), a Lebanese incorporated holding company, is the largest independent manufacturer and system house for polyurethane and adhesives used in construction, footwear, appliances and furniture sectors in Middle East and North Africa region. The Company operates manufacturing facilities in the UAE, Egypt and Italy and distribution centers in Turkey, Algeria, and Jordan. Unimetco is undertaking an investment plan to expand and establish i) polyester reactors and rigid capacity in Egypt and UAE, ii) system houses in Algeria and Nigeria, and iii) a packaging adhesives plant in Turkey. This investment plan, along with the associated permanent working capital requirement, constitutes the Project.
